text: Everything was stylish and well-made, and the prices were reasonable for the value offered. The store layout was welcoming, and the staff were also helpful and attentive. Overall, it's definitely a must-visit place for anyone looking for great Korean brands at high quality.

I bought the Stretch Massager online from Daily n Co.
When I encountered a problem, I approached the physical store as I did not know that online purchases were managed by customer service based in Korea.
